remarks: Membership of an off-center vector in a ball.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvelbl2.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvelbl2.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvelbl2.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nvelbl2.8 $e |- D = ( IndMet ` U ) $.
nvelbl2 $p |- ( ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ R e. RR+ ) /\ ( P e. X /\ A e. X ) ) -> ( ( P G A ) e. ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) <-> ( N ` A ) < R ) ) $.
